header: เครื่องทำน้ำอุ่น
งานบริการซ่อม
การคืนสินค้า

installingType.0: ติดตั้งใหม่
installingType.1: แก้ไขและซ่อมแซม
installingType.3: เพิ่มจุดรับสัญญาณ

info_delivery.query: SELECT delivery_job_id, delivery_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, delivery_product, brand_name AS delivery_brand, delivery_product_model, staff_name AS delivery_staff, delivery_location FROM info_delivery i JOIN staff s ON i.delivery_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.delivery_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.delivery_brand = b.brand_id WHERE delivery_fee = 0

info_installation_ac.query: SELECT installac_id, installac_product, installac_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, brand_name AS installac_brand, installac_model_in, staff_name AS installac_staff FROM info_installation_ac i JOIN staff s ON i.installac_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installac_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installac_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installac_fee = 0

info_installation_sat.query: SELECT installsat_id, installsat_product, installsat_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, brand_name AS installsat_brand, installsat_model_lnb, installsat_model_receiver, installsat_qty_receiver, staff_name AS installsat_staff FROM info_installation_sat i JOIN staff s ON i.installsat_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installsat_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installsat_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installsat_fee = 0

info_installation_wh.query: SELECT installwh_id, installwh_product, installwh_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, brand_name AS installwh_brand, installwh_model, staff_name AS installwh_staff FROM info_installation_wh i JOIN staff s ON i.installwh_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installwh_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installwh_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installwh_fee = 0

info_returning.query: SELECT returning_id, returning_status, returning_product, brand_name AS returning_brand, returning_model, returning_failure, returning_date FROM info_returning i JOIN brands b ON i.returning_brand = b.brand_id WHERE returning_status != 'E'
